DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study determine whether Atkins diet reduces seizure , create ketosis , well tolerate adult epilepsy . Approximately 30 patient enrol , expect 20 complete 6-month study . The investigator plan establish seizure baseline type , initiate Atkins diet , monitor administration term seizure reduction , ketosis , side effect 6-month period .
DOC.brief_title: Use Atkins Diet Adults With Intractable Epilepsy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients see Johns Hopkins General Clinical Research Center ( GCRC ) start modified Atkins diet ( 15g/day carbohydrate ) . Medications remain unchanged lab draw . Followup 1 month , 3 month , 6 month study . After 1 month , carbohydrates medication alter . Ketosis ( urine ) measure patient semiweekly , weight weekly , seizure daily record calendar . This study ongoing approximately 20 patient 30 enrol February 2006 .
DOC.criteria: Ages 18 Weekly seizures 4 time per month Use least 2 anticonvulsant drug Prior use Atkins diet > 1 week Prior use ketogenic diet within past year Kidney , heart disease , renal disease Hypercholesterolemia Pseudoseizures Pregnancy Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 Status epilepticus within past 6 month 2 week seizurefree period within past 6 month
